pages.text: Upgrade the tier of a block in world without needing to put it in a crafting grid. $(k:sneak) + $(k:use) to apply the tier installer onto an applicable block. $(p)Tier Installers can upgrade just about anything that have Basic, Advanced, Elite, and Ultimate tiers, e.g. factory machines.
Upgrades block to basic tier. Used to turn machines into their factory variant.
Upgrades block to Advanced tier. Requires block to be Basic tier first.
Upgrades block to Elite tier. Requires block to be Advanced tier first.
Upgrades block to Ultimate tier. Requires block to be Elite tier first.
